preferences.name: aol
preferences.title: AOL toolbar icon:
preferences.description: Get a free email address from AOL now! You no longer need to be an AOL member to take advantage of great AOL Mail features such as industry-leading spam and many more.

preferences.description: iCloud Mail is the free email service from Apple with ample storage, IMAP access and an elegantly functional web application.
